name: Purgatory - A long Night
description:
Purgatory - A long Night

İt’s happen in an underground world where people can't see the sky. When people lose their hopes and freedoms, someone comes to remind them again. (Us)

If you want to play the game with the music of my choice, you can download and play the rar file for $ 1.  (HTML file and music must be in the same folder to play with musics)
